!1 text
The recordType text holds records with all translated texts in the system.

There are a total of 2 validation types for this record type.

!2 coraText
Cora text is the standard text for a cora system that has sv, en, and no texts.

!2 textSystemOne
SystemOne texts are texts for the systemOne system.

!*< Setup record type definition

!define recordTypeId {text}
!define recordTypeDefinition {!-text (group)
	recordInfo (group, 1-1, noConstraint)
		id (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint, I)
		type (recordLink, 0-1, noConstraint)
		createdBy (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
		dataDivider (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint, P, I)
		permissionUnit (recordLink, 0-X, noConstraint)
		tsCreated (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint)
		updated (group, 1-X, noConstraint)
			updatedBy (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
			tsUpdated (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint)
		validationType (recordLink, 1-1, noConstraint)
	textPart type:{default, alternative}, lang:{sv, en, no} (group, 1-X, noConstraint)
		text (textVariable, 1-1, noConstraint, I)-!}

#idSource (userSupplied/timestamp/sequence) others true/false
!define recordTypeIdSource {userSupplied}
!define recordTypeIsPublic {true}
!define recordTypeUsePermissionUnit {false}
!define recordTypeUseVisibility {false}
!define recordTypeUseTrashBin {false}
!define recordTypeStoreInArchive {false}
*!
!include -seamless .HelperPages.checkRecordType
